system.description: When you point out the obvious flaw in a known foe’s plan, roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You’ve played into your enemy’s hands; watch the trap spring.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
You’re right, and another teammate (your choice) can take advantage; they get +1 ongoing to act on your information. Pick one:

  • You missed something important. The GM will tell you what.
  • You look like a showoff. Your chosen teammate takes Influence over you, and you lose Influence over them.
  • You make your teammates feel like little more than pawns. Your chosen teammate marks a condition.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You’re right, and another teammate (your choice) can take advantage; they get +1 ongoing to act on your information.
